cs5031.catalogplayer.catalog
Class CatalogFactory

java.lang.Object
  cs5031.catalogplayer.catalog.CatalogFactory

public class CatalogFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for Catalog implementations. Implementations are registered with the factory and instances are constructed using Class.newInstance(), so the implementation needs to have a simple constructor.

Author:
avoss

registerImplementation

public static void registerImplementation(java.lang.String id,
                                          java.lang.Class<? extends Catalog> implementation)
Register an implementation with the factory under the given id. The Class provided needs to have a simple constructor, i.e., one without parameters.
